Reason_archaeologically_relevant: Historical metal production in the Hajvali-Badovc-Kishnicë/Ajvalija-Badovac-Kišnica area in the prehistoric, Roman-late antique, medieval (from 1303 on) and Ottoman periods.

Mineralisation style: Veins; stockwork; impregnation; metasomatic bodies; skarn
Metals: Pb; Zn; Ag; Au; Cu; Bi
Minerals: galena; chalcopyrite; pyrite; arsenopyrite; sulphosalt minerals
Reason_archaeologically_relevant: Historical metal production in the Hajvali-Badovc-Kishnicë/Ajvalija-Badovac-Kišnica area in the prehistoric, Roman-late antique, medieval (from 1303 on) and Ottoman periods.
